info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 3:29PM EST until February 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Bradford County in PA, and Chemung, Tioga, Broome, Chenango, and Otsego Counties in NY. * WHEN...Until 3 PM Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s and Friday morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Light rain will change to a wintry mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain this evening. The wintry mix will change to all snow by early Friday morning. Snowfall amounts will form a very sharp gradient close to the Susquehanna River.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, or by dialing 511 from within the state. The latest road conditions for Pennsylvania can be found at 511pa.com, or by dialing 511 from within the state.
